Title: Establishes a rebate against real property taxes for certain owners of real property in the city of New York
Summary: Establishes a rebate against real property taxes for certain owners of real property in the city of New York for the fiscal year commencing on the first of July, two thousand twenty-four.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the real property tax law, in relation to a rebate against real property taxes for certain owners of real property in the city of New York
